name: Perfect Puck'r Hydrating Lip Care Duo
about: What it is:u00a0The ultimate lip care pair for super-soft lips sealed with a kiss. Treat your pout to a stronger moisture barrier with Fenty Treatz. Boost lipsu2019 smoothness, firmness and bounce with Plush Puddinu2019. Put these thirst-quenching treats on repeat to keep your lips plump and juicy day and night...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness..Highlighted Ingredients:- Jojoba Seed & Rosehip Fruit Oils: Lock in moisture and soothe dry lips..- Barbados Cherry (Acerola) & Wild Cherry Extracts: Antioxidant-rich; condition and renew lips..- Pomegranate Sterols: All-natural vegan alternative to lanolin; enhance lipsu2019 moisture barrier and boost hydration...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Plush Puddin Lip Mask:.Get hydrated and nourished lips fast. This mask reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles and visibly improves bounce and elasticity. Lips are left looking fuller, more sculpted, and defined. Itu2019s infused with a light scent and flavor...Fenty Treatz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil:.This antioxidant-rich formula defends lips against environmental stressors. It nourishes dry, chapped lips, and visily plumps lips with hydration while decadent oils bind moisture to lips. It features a yummy scent and an ultra-plush doe-foot applicator for the ultimate treat...This Set Contains:- 0.19 oz/ 5.6 mL Fenty Treatz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil.- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Plush Puddinu2019 Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E..Research Results:Fenty Treatz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil.-Hydrates and strengthens lipsu2019 moisture barrier for fuller-looking lips.Antioxidant-rich formula defends lips against environmental stressors.Instantly conditions and softens lips, improving lipsu2019 texture over time.Infused with a yummy, ripe Barbados Cherry-inspired scent..Plush Puddinu2019 Intensive Recovery Lip Mask.-Instantly hydrates + nourishes and provides long-lasting hydration day or night.-Smooths texture and reduces the look of lines and wrinkles in just 1 week.-Firms and improves elasticity in just 1 week.-Infused with a light Vanilla-inspired scent......
ingredients: -Jojoba Seed & Rosehip Fruit Oils: Lock in moisture and soothe dry lips..-Barbados Cherry (Acerola) & Wild Cherry Extracts: Antioxidant-rich; condition and renew lips..-Pomegranate Sterols: All-natural vegan alternative to lanolin; enhance lipsu2019 moisture barrier and boost hydration...Fenty Treatz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil:.Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dextrin Palmitate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Malpighia Glabra (Acerola) Fruit Extract*, Prunus Serotina (Wild Cherry) Fruit Extract*, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Root Extract, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Aroma/Flavor...Plush Puddinu2019 Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E:.Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Polyethylene, Silica, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Flower Extract, Punica Granatum Sterols, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Aroma/Flavor, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Plush Puddinu2019 Intensive Recovery Lip Mask:.-Twist base counter-clockwise to use..-Apply to lips as needed day or/and night....Fenty Treatz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil:.-Apply as often as needed for quickly hydrated, smooth lips....Recycling Instructions:.-Its protective outer box is made of FSC material and is recyclable. FSC certification ensures that our boxes come from responsibly managed forests....Fenty Treatz:.-When youu2019re done, swipe on the last of the goodness. Then, rinse and discard the cap and recycle the tube..-The tube is recyclable depending on your region; check your local guidelines....Plush Puddinu2019:.-Made from 100% PCR (post-consumer recycled) material..-The entire pot is recyclable depending on your region; check your local guidelines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip care duo. I had been wanting the lip oil and pudding for a while but never wanted to spend the money so this was great because I got both, full size, for a good price. I love both products and they feel amazing on my lips. The one thing I hate it after a while of it being on your lips it starts to get a weird texture but it's just the dryness of my lips coming off. Both products smell amazing too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first, it did dry my lips, but like any other new skin product, I gave it a few weeks and could tell a huge difference. I also used a lip scrub, which helped with the beginning dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This this combo will be a forever favorite for me. My bottom lip is always dehydrated and prevents me from using lip stains or matte lipsticks - it does not even distribute or is darker in the creases. Carmex just doesn't do it, Vasoline failed me along with numerous other lip oils that feel sticky, or clumpy instead of hydrating.  Within a week of using the plush puddin + cherry treat my lips were hydrated and feel amazing. I travel to Europe in the winter every year which also dries out my lips so I am always looking for a hydrating serum to help. At night I apply a decent amount of the plush pudding, and rinse with warm water in the morning. After giving my lips a little time in natural state I add a light amount of the plush puddin and a top layer of the lip oil. I am a texture person so I hate when lip oils are thicke and sticky consistency it does not work well on my lips. This combo does wonders for my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the lip oil donu2019t get me wrong, but it smells kinda like cough syrup. And the pudding is basically overpriced vaseline in a fancy cup so not really worth the money.
This lip oil dried my lips out so bad, to the point where they were bleeding the next day. It looks great as a gloss but itu2019s terrible in every other aspect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My lips feel great after using this for not even a full week!

reviews.review_title: It's a lip oil not a gloss let's start there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very moisturizing duo. also it's a lip oil NOT a gloss so that may be why you are having trouble using the lip gloss it's getting so frustrating seeing bad reviews because people (kids?) don't even understand what they are buying or don't read the details or don't seem to have any experience with makeup so they blame the product. or they think it's too expensive and everyone should buy ELF . it's not fair to the consumers or brands and I swear that's why they brands are sending free product for reviews- otherwise you have tons of misplaced negative reviews!

reviews.review_title: Lip mask paid with my own money.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lip mask paid with my own money. It does an amazing job job keeping my lip hydrated. I lipstick used to be always chapped and needed daily exfoliation. Iu2019ve tried numerous lip treatments and they did not help a lot until I found this one . I put it before bed and wake up witg nicr smooth lioe. Truly a game gangrr one. Putting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was a great product. And good deal. Just wish the application on the lip mask was different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the lip oil. Itu2019s my go to for a lot and the lip mask is top notch but I prefer the melon scent compared to this vanilla one

reviews.review_title: nice lip products (I actually paid for them)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: the lip oil isnu2019t my favourite but I wouldnu2019t say itu2019s bad, a little on the thin side (it is a oil/gloss) I just prefer my Clarins. the lip balm is nice (quite thick) and despite needing to apply it with your fingers itu2019s not unhygienic. it also didnu2019t give me a reaction and I have very sensitive skin, like I canu2019t even use aquafor! if you want to try these products iu2019d say do it and the set as itu2019s a better deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The push puddin made my lips peal. Not worth it. Donu2019t recommend

reviews.review_title: A must-have for good smelling and moisturized lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these products! The lip oil smells so good and is not too sticky nor slippery. The lip mask really works, I put some before going to bed and when I wake up, my lips are still moisturized!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it is so cool and my lips feel so moisturizing and the lip mask is so good that it leaves my lip like a silky feeling
